thread.section_title: Novotel London West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Average and noisy
thread.title_full: Average and noisy - Review of Novotel London West, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MCMJ2014
title: Average and noisy
text:
Stayed 2 nights for a conference in the hotel.
The rooms are fine - good size and clean - but basic. Things like only one pillow on the bed, minimal toiletries, no mini bar.
The place charges city centre prices but is on the outskirts.
But the worst thing is that it is full of large groups of tourists so you have people running up and down the corridors, loud TVs, doors being slammed all night,
Not a good place if you actually want to sleep. Huge queues at breakfast if you time it wrong,
